text: When the Trees Were Tall () is a 1961 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Kulidzhanov.Когда деревья были большими It stars Inna Gulaya, Yuri Nikulin, and Leonid Kuravlyov. ==Actors== * Inna Gulaya as Natasha * Yuri Nikulin as Kuzma Kuzmich Iordanov * Leonid Kuravlyov as Lenka * Yekaterina Mazurova as Anastasiya Borisovna * Vasily Shukshin as Chairman of the Kolkhoz * Lyudmila Chursina as Zoya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1961 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: When the Trees Were Tall
